content: Stanley Black & Decker Inc   in its second big acquisition in three months  agreed to buy Sears Holdings Corp's  Craftsman brand  giving the company known mainly for power tools an entry into the lawn and garden equipment market. | Video
name: Stanley Black & Decker Inc
title: Stanley B&D moves into lawn and garden market with Craftsman buy

content: Sears Holdings Corp  said it would sell its Craftsman tools business to Stanley Black & Decker Inc  for $900 million  sending its shares up and taking some of the focus away from the company's dismal holiday season performance.
name: Stanley Black & Decker Inc
title: Sears' Craftsman deal deflects focus from dismal holiday sales
